salaryExpectations: LKR 150,000 (Vice Principal) to LKR 450,000+ (Principal of a large international school) per month.
futureOutlook: This is a career path of progression, typically starting from teaching. The demand is stable, with opportunities in both the government and private sectors. The private and international school sector, in particular, is growing and offers competitive salaries for experienced and qualified administrators with a proven track record of academic leadership.
